events.headline: CONSTRUCTION
events.description: Highway 17, in both directions. Construction work between 92nd Street and 96th Street. Until Wed Nov 30, 2022. Lane closures in both directions planned. Please slow down and watch for and obey traffic signage and personnel. Expect delays. Plan your route ahead. Last updated Fri Sep 25 at 8:26 PM PDT. (DBC-21374)
events.+ivr_message: Highway 17, in both directions. Construction work between 92nd Street and 96th Street. Until Wednesday, November 30. Lane closures in both directions planned. Please slow down and watch for and obey traffic signage and personnel. Expect delays. Plan your route ahead. Last updated Friday, September 25 at 8:26 PM.

events.headline: CONSTRUCTION
events.description: Highway 91, northbound. Construction work between Exit 6: 72 Ave and Exit 8: Nordel Way (Delta). Until Wed Nov 30, 2022. Exit ramp is closed. Expect delays. Watch for traffic control. All traffic bound for Nordel way will use the Nordel way westbound loop ramp. Last updated Fri Sep 3 at 4:25 AM PDT. (DBC-21272)
events.+ivr_message: Highway 91, northbound. Construction work between Exit 6: 72 Ave and Exit 8: Nordel Way (Delta). Until Wednesday, November 30. Exit ramp is closed. Expect delays. Watch for traffic control. All traffic bound for Nordel way will use the Nordel way westbound loop ramp. Last updated Friday, September 3 at 4:25 AM.
